0.1.name: wordpress/taxonomy-terms-list
0.1.description:
This plugin will create a list for each taxonomy whose terms have been associated to a given post. These list will appear after the post content. This plugin will not effect builtin taxonomies such as categories, tags and link categories.

Support

If you find that this plugin is has a bug, does not play nicely with other plugins or if you have a suggestion or comment, please use this link to add a new thread to the WordPress Support Forum
